attributes.action: A 2016 general election due to a new conservative mandate post Brexit vote
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron was voted in on the premise of a pro EU party, the change of prime minister nullifies the vote that was made by the people in 2015.
attributes.background: The party that was voted for in 2015 has changed so much since 2015, the change of prime minister and the upcoming mandate of the government has changed so considerably as to require a vote from the general public.
